mapper.sql: FROM users u LEFT JOIN employee e ON e.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN job_standard j ON j.job_id = e.job_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.dept_id = e.dept_id LEFT JOIN title_standard ts ON ts.title_standard = e.title_standard
mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, j.job_name AS jobName, u.email AS email, u.auth AS auth, d.dept_name AS deptName, ts.title_name AS titleName, u.status AS status
ORDER BY u.user_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
